text: banda anakneasar teangnoh yeung ban leukatamkeung puokke aoy brasaer cheang knea . knongchamnaom puokke mean anakakhleah a l laoh ban bantoul cheamuoy puokke phtal ning anak khleahtiet trong ban leukatamkeung than dl puokke . haey yeung ban bratan aoy ai sa kaun mea r yea nouv mou chi hsaa t cheachraen haey yeung ban pongrung roubke daoy chi pri l . haey brasenbae a l laoh mean chetnea puok chomnean kraoypi anak noam sar teangnoh min kabsamleab knea laey banteabpi phosdo tang neanea ban mokadl puokke . bo nde puokke ban khvengyobl knea . hetonih puokke khleah mean chomnue ning khleahtiet kmean chomnue . haey brasenbae a l laoh mean chetnea puokke brakadchea min kabsamleab knea laey . bo nde a l laoh thveu towteam avei del trong mean bamnng
